statements: UPDATE game_level_data SET level_data = '{"data": 100}' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE game_level_data SET level_number = 5, level_data = '{"data": 200}' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE game_level_data SET level_number = 2, level_data = '{"name": "Level 2", "difficulty": "medium"}' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE game_level_data SET level_data = '{"name": "Final Level", "difficulty": "hard"}', level_number = 10 WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE level_data SET level_name='Intermediate', difficulty=3 WHERE level_id=1;
UPDATE tile_data SET is_obstacle=true, tile_type='Rock' WHERE tile_id=10;
UPDATE level_data SET difficulty = 3, level_name = 'Hard Level' WHERE level_id = 1;
UPDATE tile_data SET tile_type = 'Rock', is_obstacle = TRUE WHERE tile_id = 2;
UPDATE game_levels SET level_difficulty = 2 WHERE level_id = 1;
UPDATE level_entities SET entity_health = 100, entity_name = 'Enemy', entity_type = 'EnemyType' WHERE entity_id = 3;
UPDATE game_levels SET level_seed = 'new_seed', level_difficulty = 3 WHERE level_id = 1;
UPDATE level_entities SET entity_health = 100, entity_name = 'Boss' WHERE entity_id = 10;
UPDATE GameLevels SET level_difficulty = 3 WHERE level_id = 1;
UPDATE LevelEnemies SET enemy_strength = 50, enemy_type = 'Boss' WHERE level_id = 2;
UPDATE GameLevels SET level_difficulty = 2 WHERE level_id = 1;
UPDATE LevelItems SET item_name = 'Golden Sword', item_type = 'Weapon' WHERE level_id = 3;
UPDATE GameLevels SET difficulty_level = 3 WHERE level_id = 1;
UPDATE PlayerProgress SET progress_status = 'Completed' WHERE level_id = 1 AND player_id = 101;
UPDATE GameLevels SET difficulty_level = 3, level_data = '{"theme": "Desert", "num_of_enemies": 10}' WHERE level_id = 5;
UPDATE LevelEnemies SET enemy_name = 'Boss', enemy_strength = 100 WHERE enemy_id = 7;
